name: Masquerade Puzzle
description:
Simple tile-based puzzle game. There are 3 powers you can use:

Bull mask lets you push blocks. You can push them into the water to make more floor!

Hawk mask lets you move 2 spaces instead of 1, allowing you to jump over blocks, walls and water.

Goat mask lets you climb up a block or wall, and walk along it until you jump down.
